txt.en:
'What a beautiful day! The flowers are in full bloom, the bees are buzzing about, all sorts of critters are running around, and the fish are at their peak! You should catch some for the Lithe Festival.

'I went last year and all they had were dwarf fish. It was terrible! Just simply too tough... couldn't chew a thing. Our fish are the best, from right here in Bree!

'The best fish can be found in this pond right here. I'm sure the farmers will let you fish here for some time.'
'You oughtn't tarry long here, [placeholder], for your time is already running out! Good luck to you.'

The Men of Bree wish to help the hobbits in their annual fishing derby by allowing fishermen to catch fish from the pond by the farm.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Catch as many fish as you can in twenty minutes.
The fish pond is east of Andrath farm.\n\nWill Hindmarsh has asked you to catch fish for the hobbits' Lithe Festival.
